title: What makes a video go viral? Emergence!
lessonRelevance: Summarizes key take-homes from lesson 2. Students will have explored The Game of Life to discover what *emergence* means.

title: "Swimming in the Dark"
lessonRelevance: Run digital experiments to understand fish schooling.
